text: geudaedeul jung-e sum-eul geodun jaga anaeleul namgil ttae geunyeodeul-eun sagaewol sib-il-eul chamgo gidalyeoya hanola. geulihayeo geunyeodeul-i jasin-ui gigan-e dodalhayeossdamyeon geunyeodeul-i habdanghan bangsig-eulo jasin-eul wihae han il e gwanhayeo geudaedeul-eun joega eobsnola. hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-i haenghaneun il-e balg-eusin bun-ila
